arm_group.description: 20 patients will be treated with the first planned dose, i.e. 20 µg/mL
After completion of Group 1 treatment, data on primary efficacy and safety variables will be reviewed to identify the appropriate dose for Group 2

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to assess the efficacy and safety of different doses of rhNGF
      when administered as eye drops to patients with Dry Eye.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of rhNGF Eye Drops at Different Doses in Patients With Dry Eye

intervention.description: 1 drop  for each eye, twice daily for 28 day
either 4 µg/mL, option 1 or 60 µg/mL, option 2; 1 drop  each eye, twice daily for 28 day
intervention.intervention_name: Human nerve growth factor 4 µg/mL or 60 µg/mL

clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label Study Evaluating Safety and Efficacy of Recombinant Human Nerve Growth Factor (rhNGF) Eye Drops at Different Doses in Patients With Dry Eye

overall_official.affiliation: Medical University of Vienna, Vienna General Hospital, AKH

oversight_info.authority: Austria: Agency for Health and Food Safety
